title: Making Rice
subtle: How to (nonfiction), 814 words, Level N (Grade 2), Lexile 610L
description: Making Rice is an informational text about rice and its importance in China. The book provides instructions on how to prepare and cook rice. Also included is a detailed, step-by-step recipe for chicken-fried rice that the whole family can enjoy.
highFrequencyWords: absorbs, Asian, measuring cup, paddies, spatula, strainer, wok
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Vowel Digraphs : Identify vowel digraphs ee, ea, and ie
awareness: Plural Nouns                : Recognize and use plural nouns
phonics: Multiple Meaning Words                : Identify multiple-meaning words
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
